pullrequest.title: update shim controller to do pid servo control

content.raw:
just added bfbb485 to update stand pose to be more symmetric. pass throught atlas_command to atlas_sim_interface_command for joint servo commands. update pose to lean forward a little more due to backpack mass. update atlas v3 pid gains.

now the robot does not swing wildly, but it still cannot maintain balance.
content.html:
just added bfbb485 to update stand pose to be more symmetric. pass throught atlas_command to atlas_sim_interface_command for joint servo commands. update pose to lean forward a little more due to backpack mass. update atlas v3 pid gains.

now the robot does not swing wildly, but it still cannot maintain balance.
